content: Then he showed me Joshua the high priest standing before the Angel of the , and Satan standing at his right hand to oppose him.
And the  said to Satan, “The  rebuke you, Satan! The  who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you!  this not a brand plucked from the fire?”
Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and was standing before the Angel.

Then He answered and spoke to those who stood before Him, saying, “Take away the filthy garments from him.” And to him He said, “See, I have removed your iniquity from you, and I will clothe you with rich robes.”
And I said, “Let them put a clean turban on his head.”So they put a clean turban on his head, and they put the clothes on him. And the Angel of the  stood by.
Then the Angel of the  admonished Joshua, saying,
